description:
Premier Class-A office suite in Mamaroneck's most desirable professional building. This 1,800 SF second-floor suite offers an ideal environment for a professional services firm, medical practice, or creative agency.

The space features an open-plan work area accommodating 12-15 workstations, two private offices, a glass-enclosed conference room, a dedicated reception area, and a kitchenette. Recent renovation in 2023 includes new LED lighting, updated HVAC, and high-speed fiber connectivity.
